__e: How dare you tell me how to bring up my child!
And he has the nerve to tell me that I'm going to kill myself.
Where do you get the gall to tell me what I should or should not do?
How dare you do that to me!
Once he's in it, he doesn't dare do things he used to do.
Does any man here dare tell me what I must do?
How can a person use words like that?
Have i said something- how dare you say to me that you're busy and suggest that i go around asking other men to take me here and there?
You dare to speak to me of conscience you who have already bartered your soul to the devil?
How dare you speak when I have not asked you a question.
How dare you talk to me in that tone of voice?
How dare you talk that way to the Queen?
Daughter, how dare you to speak like that of a pious person?
How dare you speak like that to your father?
How dare you tell him I'm a toilet trader?
In other words, you dare not speak because you know you're guilty!
You made it, and no one dare speak to you about it any more;
